about_the_game:
Elovelle. A city of devils. Demons across the city fractured into clans in the pursuit of their desires. The most notorious among them were the Knights of Virtue. The Knights of Virtue seized the famed Fountain of Elovelle and built a fortress around it. Speaking words of virtue to the powerful Essence. Many clans now wage war against the Knights. Attempting to take the fountain's power for themselves and become the new masters of the city. Chaos reigns across Elovelle. Ferality spreads throughout the realm.

This is the story of one who would try to heal the broken heart of this city.

And how I stopped her…
